instructions: # Character Sheet When creating multiple attributes (with the '+Add' and 'Modify' buttons), you will need to modify each attribute before adding a new one. Send bug reports and feature requests [here](https://github.com/ericfinn/roll20-nightshade/issues). This sheet was based off of the Fate: Core Edition sheet by Andrew Bailey (krathognis) and Devindra Payment (@Ardnived)
